BuildWithTychiWallet.description: Unlock the full potential of Web3 with Tychi Wallet’s tools and resources. Whether you're a developer, a dApp creator, or an asset owner, we provide everything you need to thrive in the decentralized ecosystem.

Guides.description: Get guides for building powerful Web3 applications, including multi-chain compatibility and gas fee optimization with TYI Token and BNB.
example_questions: How do I integrate Tychi Wallet into my project?
What are the benefits of using TYI Token for gas fees?

WalletCore.description: Open-source, mobile-focused crypto wallet library supporting multi-chain transactions, staking, token swapping, and more.
example_questions: What features does Wallet Core support?
Where can I find Wallet Core on GitHub?

SubmitDApp.description: Get your decentralized app listed on Tychi Wallet to reach millions globally, leveraging multi-chain support and seamless UI.
example_questions: How do I submit my dApp to Tychi Wallet?
What are the benefits of listing my dApp?

GetAssetsListed.description: List your tokens or digital assets on Tychi Wallet for increased visibility with multi-chain integration and gas fee flexibility.
example_questions: How do I list my asset on Tychi Wallet?
Can I pay gas fees with TYI Token or BNB?

multi_chain_ecosystem.description: Integrate and operate across 100+ blockchains effortlessly.
example_questions: What blockchains does Tychi Wallet support?

developer_friendly_tool.description: Streamlined SDKs and APIs for smooth integration.
example_questions: How easy is it to integrate Tychi Wallet with my app?

gas_fee_optimization.description: Empower users to pay transaction fees in TYI Token or BNB.
example_questions: How can users optimize gas fees?

global_audience.description: Connect with a rapidly growing Web3 community.
example_questions: How big is the Tychi Wallet user base?

BuildWithTychiWallet.closing_statement: Start building the future with Tychi Wallet today! 1 Million Users, Plus You.

PrivacyPolicy.description: Tychi Wallet is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

Introduction.description: Welcome to TychiWallet. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal data.
example_questions: What is Tychi Wallet's approach to privacy?
Why is my privacy important to Tychi Wallet?

PersonalInformation.description: Name, email address, phone number (if provided), and identification documents for KYC/AML compliance.
example_questions: What personal information does Tychi Wallet collect?
Do I need to provide ID documents?

NonPersonalInformation.description: Device information like IP address, browser type, operating system, usage data including transaction history and interactions.
example_questions: What non-personal information does Tychi Wallet collect?
Does Tychi Wallet track my device info?

BlockchainData.description: Public blockchain addresses associated with your transactions and blockchain transaction details (which Tychi Wallet does not control).
example_questions: What blockchain data does Tychi Wallet collect?
Does Tychi Wallet control blockchain transaction data?

HowWeUseYourInformation.description: We use your data to provide and improve services, facilitate transactions, ensure legal compliance, prevent fraud, and communicate updates.
example_questions: How does Tychi Wallet use my information?
Is my data used to prevent fraud?

InformationSharingAndDisclosure.description: We do not sell personal data but may share it with service providers, regulatory authorities, or during business transfers.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet share my personal data?
Who might Tychi Wallet share my information with?

DataSecurity.description: Industry-standard security measures like encryption and access controls are implemented, but absolute security cannot be guaranteed.
example_questions: How does Tychi Wallet protect my data?
Is my information completely secure?

YourRightsAndChoices.description: You have rights to access, correct, delete your data, and opt out of marketing communications by contacting Tychi Wallet.
example_questions: How can I access or correct my data?
Can I opt out of marketing emails?

CookiesAndTrackingTechnologies.description: Tychi Wallet uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience. Cookie settings can be managed via browser.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet use cookies?
How do I manage cookie settings?

ThirdPartyLinks.description: Our services may link to third-party websites whose privacy practices are not controlled by Tychi Wallet.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet control third-party websites?
Are third-party links safe?

ChildrensPrivacy.description: Tychi Wallet does not knowingly collect data from individuals under 18 and will remove such data if discovered.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet collect data from children?
What happens if data from under 18 is collected?

ChangesToPrivacyPolicy.description: Privacy Policy updates will be posted on our website. Continued use of services constitutes acceptance of the changes.
example_questions: How will I know if the privacy policy changes?
What if I don't agree with changes to the privacy policy?

ContactInformation.description: For questions or concerns about the Privacy Policy, please contact Tychi Wallet.
example_questions: How can I contact Tychi Wallet about privacy concerns?
Where can I ask questions about the privacy policy?

PrivacyPolicy.closing_statement: This Privacy Policy complies with applicable laws and best practices. For full legal compliance, consult a legal expert.

overview.summary: Tychi Wallet is a multi-chain crypto wallet built on advanced blockchain protocols, offering secure storage, universal gas fee flexibility, decentralized identity, and user-friendly features. It supports thousands of tokens across 50+ networks and includes educational resources and debit card integration.

technology.overview: Tychi Wallet leverages cutting-edge blockchain protocols and cryptographic techniques to provide seamless asset management, secure offline storage, and universal gas fee handling.

multi_chain_asset_management.description: Manage assets across blockchains with a single interface using cross-chain bridges like Wormhole and Cosmos IBC.
how_it_works: Detects blockchain type of each asset added.
Syncs transactions and balances via APIs and node integration.
Displays token data, contract interactions, and transaction history in a unified interface.

technology_stack.blockchain_interoperability: Uses cross-chain bridges (e.g., Wormhole, Cosmos IBC) and APIs for seamless data communication.
technology_stack.node_integration: Directly connects to blockchain nodes for real-time transaction updates.

measures: Decentralized storage options for private keys.

universal_gas_fee_flexibility.description: Allows payment of gas fees using TYI or BNB instead of native tokens, via a smart contract-based fee abstraction layer.
how_it_works: Real-time conversion using DEX liquidity pools and market data.
Smart contract calculates and converts TYI/BNB to required gas token.
Backend module interacts with chain-specific smart contracts and maintains a native token reserve.
benefits: Reduces need for multiple native tokens.
Minimizes slippage and fees using real-time data.

cold_wallet_storage.description: Offline storage of private keys using device-based, decentralized cloud, or external hardware methods.

methods.device_based: Stores AES-256 encrypted keys on user's device with three-factor authentication (password + biometric + OTP).
methods.decentralized_cloud: Uses IPFS/Arweave with Shamir’s Secret Sharing to split and distribute encrypted key fragments.
methods.external_hardware: Keys stored on encrypted USB drives with tamper-proof features.

debit_card_integration.description: Spend crypto through digital or physical debit cards via payment APIs and partnerships with Visa/Mastercard.
how_it_works: Real-time crypto-to-fiat conversion via integrated liquidity pools.
Funds transferred to a custodian account managed by a payment gateway.
Smart contracts ensure transparency and traceability.
debit_card_integration.user_interface: Dashboard with real-time updates, spending analytics, and card settings.

educational_resources.description: Learn blockchain, DeFi, and crypto through modules, videos, quizzes, and case studies.
features: TYI rewards for module completion via smart contracts.

multi_chain_management.description: Unified control of assets across 50+ blockchains using a modular architecture with Unified API Layer and Multi-Chain Connector.
components: Unified API Layer for standardized operations.
Smart contracts for asset transfer, staking, and swaps.

thousands_of_cryptocurrencies.description: Supports ERC-20, BEP-20, TRC-20 and more across Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Solana, Tron, Avalanche, and others.
features: Unified API for token data aggregation.

why_tychi.innovative: Features like universal gas fee payments and secure cold storage distinguish Tychi from competitors.
why_tychi.secure: Built with top-tier security standards like AES-256, 2FA, biometric auth, and decentralized storage.
why_tychi.user_friendly: Modern UI and simplified workflows for both beginners and advanced users.
